website_summaries.verdict: Great features for cooking multiple waffles at once.
pros: Cook four waffles at once, cutting down on your time making breakfast for the family
The Oster DuraCeramic coating makes the plates easy to clean and nonstick
No need to add oil when cooking, as the coating is infused with extra virgin olive oil
Cooks fast, saving time and energy
cons: Does not create the crispy outside that many like without applying cooking oil to the plates first

customer_reviews.title: True to it's name - "Non-Stick" and Effortless clean up!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this waffle iron. It truly is a non-stick surface with no need to add sprays or oils. It cleaned easily with quick wipe down with a paper towel. It's also perfect for anyone with a bird (such as ourselves) because the ceramic cooking surface doesn't omit toxic fumes like other non-stick surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Coating chipping/flaking in one spot
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Part of the white ceramic coating was chipping off after one use. That one use worked great, and we cleaned it easily (and were very gentle with it). It would be easier to clean if the cooking plates were removable, but not a deal breaker for us. The coating chipping, however, was a deal breaker. The coating was not perfectly smooth in one place, and it just started flaking off when I noticed it and touched it with my finger. First concern is food safety. And how long before more chipping happens and affects the operation of the product?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: My son loves waffles so I use this too make up large batches for my freezer tht he can jut pop into the toaster or microwave. Doesn't stick and makes up a bunch of tasty waffles in a sort order. Even came with recipes to try! It's hard to find a square shapped waffle maker now so I was pleased when I found this one.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Boy

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Tried several different batters, differefnt amounts of batter, and they all came out flat and unbrowned on top. It appears as though the top plate just doesn't heat up enough to bake the top of the waffle, no matter what the indicator light says.
customer_reviews.author: damazinah

customer_reviews.title: No worries,  great evenly cooked waffles
customer_reviews.text: We have used this waffle maker two times since our purchase. There is no need to oil, spray or fuss-waffle comes out effortlessly. The plates are not super small like the old fashioned makers, they are a touch larger but smaller than the Belgian waffle makers. I would consider this a great choice, has met our family of 6 needs. When steam amount reduces, I check on it, there is no timer. Solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SunFam6

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Waffle Maker....
customer_reviews.text: Waffle Iron/Maker is PTFE/PFOA friendly meaning non-stick, non Teflon cookware. My grandmother's waffle iron was 41 years old (ceased functioning October 16, 2016), similar to this new one (non-PTFE/PFOA/Teflon) safe - it never had waffles sticking to the iron, nor did we have to scrape out excess batter. The result: fluffy, thick, delicious maple syrup laced with butter Belgian Waffles. This one works well....so far so good; pleasing results including non-stick and no scraping arduous cleanup. Merci!
customer_reviews.author: Movies...

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this waffle maker for 2 months now. We eat waffles once a week. There isn’t really anything good about it. Here is the problem: 1. It’s supposed to be for thin waffles, but it doesn’t make think. With my old maker I got 8 waffles, this one I get 5. I don’t know if the plates are too far apart or what. 2. If you don’t overflow the maker, see the picture for what happens. 3 If I fill it enough, the waffles don’t cook all the way and are very thick where they should be thin. Thicker then a Belgium waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious waffles but.......
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is what I was looking for because it makes regular thickness waffles. Most of the waffle makers are Belgian waffle makers and make the thicker, bigger waffles. The reason for the two star rating is because the plates flip to a flat side and as a result they are very loose and seem like they could fall out easily. It makes it a bit sketchy to make your waffles and to store upright.
customer_reviews.author: mountaincrest1

customer_reviews.title: Not nonstick.
customer_reviews.text: Well first off, this thing is not non-stick. It was for the first couple uses but now if I don't grease this thing up, I'm only getting 80% of my waffle off the iron. The more I use it, the more I notice the uneven cooking pattern as well. The inside corners get super cooked while the outer edges remain lighter. I now have resorted to undercooking them and finishing them in the toaster. If I could 'd send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Half Brindle

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use & clean!
customer_reviews.text: My son is different lol he was 12 and wanted a waffle maker for the holidays. So I gave him this as a present. I'll be honest, I got the gift of relaxing on weekends while he cooks lol. This thing is great! The light let's him know when he can pour the batter. When it stops steaming your waffle is done cooking. You just lift a corner then lift the whole thing out. Afterwards he unplugs it, leaves it open, and once it cools he takes a clean dry rag to wipe out anything that might be left. Usually there's nothing to wipe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Erika

customer_reviews.title: Makes soft waffles
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice big waffle maker and the non-stick surface really works, but I'm disappointed that the waffles don't come out golden, light and crispy like the ones I make in my 1970's waffle maker. They are soft on the outside and denser than I like my waffles. Putting them in the toaster or on the rack in the oven helps.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sibbett

customer_reviews.title: The ceramic non-stick surface works well.
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic non-stick surface works well. I've had no trouble with sticking, even making low fat waffles without added oil. I do use a light spray of oil directly on the plates before using. I wish the plates were removable for cleaning so I took a star off for this design flaw. I've enjoyed this for making waffles, hash brown potatoes and sweet potatoes and waffled tofu.
customer_reviews.author: contrarytwin

customer_reviews.title: love the ceramic coating easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: love the ceramic coating easy cleanup. spend the additional couple of dollars. protect your self. price was still reasonable $30.00.
customer_reviews.author: dirk diggler/jack mayhoffer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big belgian waffle maker but I wanted square ones that would fit in the toaster to reheat. I cleaned it with soap and water and plugged it in to "burn" off the chemical smell twice before I used it. Makes perfect waffles that are not too thick or too thin. I would not call this a belgian waffle, just a regular one which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick cooking!
customer_reviews.text: So I haven't made waffles yet, but I have made ham and cheese breakfast buscuits (four sandwiches in four minutes!!) several times, quessidillas (sp?), cinnamon rolls and hash browns and I can't wait to see what we'll come up with next! Cooking just got fun again!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Comes out clean every time.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even use any type of oil on the waffle iron, just use a pastry brush to knock out any crumbs or residue. I have found 7 minutes to be the perfect timing for my coconut flour waffles. I have used it at least 3 days a week for a year now and it is still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: CDS

customer_reviews.title: Not a Classic Waffle/ half way between Classic and Belgium, too thick. doesn't cook evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this waffle maker because it said it was a "Classic" waffle iron. It is not it is too thick. kind of a halfway between Classic and Belgium. It also does not cook evenly. The first waffle comes out ok because you have given it time to heat up the top half, but if you just go on to pull one waffle and make a second the top does not get hot enough to cook the top of the waffle to I am flipping the waffle over in the maker and allowing it to cook the second side. If I had not thrown out the box I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mustache Bob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well, makes waffles taste disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: This thing took forever to cook 1 waffle. After I finally got it cooked, it tasted like garbage. Totally inedible. Yes, I did wash it as directed, but the "oil infused" plated made it taste nasty. Promptly returned and do not recommend this product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Second one I bought, a "friend" "stole" my first one...
customer_reviews.text: It was so good my friend 'stole' my first one. Technically borrowed and said to was going to keep it. So, more than a friend, and more than an average waffle maker. Works wonderfully on regular, and even more difficult, the terribly hard work with gluten free recipes. Note, for Gluten Free, cook a little longer, and flip it over. I don't have to do this with standard mix. Just Gluten Free. But GF has always been more of a struggle
customer_reviews.author: David Hughes

customer_reviews.title: great company replaces defective waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: first arrived broken returned it used new one three times now doesn't work at all no lights come on when plugged in and will not heat tried several electrical outlets I contacted Oster They were very professional and sent a new one for no charge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too great.
customer_reviews.text: First time we tried to use it we waited until the light came on saying it was hot enough. Put in the batter and waited over 15 minutes and only the bottom half cooked the top was totally raw. Not too great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and nothing sticks
customer_reviews.text: I waited til I had used this for awhile before writing a review. I've had no issues with it. When I remember to add oil to my waffle mix they never stick. Heats up quick, too. Cooks the waffles quickly, too. I've had no issues whatsoever with this product. I use it every Saturday and I highly recommend it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Buss

customer_reviews.title: Not the best waffle maker no temp control or timer control
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality unit however it does not have temperature control and i find i have to leave the waffles cooking way past the time the indicator light comes on for the waffles to be done. The preset timer barely cooks to a very light tan. Far from done. In the end it works and makes waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Cook Oatmeal Waffles
customer_reviews.text: I opened this today and tried cooking my regular gluten-free, oatmeal waffles that take 8 minutes in a conventional belgian waffle iron. They took 15 or more minutes and were soft and mushy at that. I don't think ceramic is the answer for these kind of waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Not getting hot enough
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. 1st one made great crispy waffles, the 2nd one is not getting hot enough. I need it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Gerald R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not make crispy waffles
customer_reviews.text: I have cooked them and cooked them; used different waffle batter and they all come out soft and mushy. I think the non-stick coating could be the culprit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We were looking to get rid of the Teflon and hoping for a great appliance. This fills the bill perfectly. It uses our favorite recipe completely for one go, so it is perfect for my wife and I. So far, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Worked at first but on the third try quit operating properly. Tried several different batters, differefnt amounts of batter, and they all came out flat and unbrowned on top. It appears as though the top plate just doesn't heat up enough to bake the top of the waffle, no matter what the indicator light says.
customer_reviews.author: Philip  Yaciuk

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty and the size is nice
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty and the size is nice, but it doesn't heat nearly as well as our old non-stick one. The waffles take a long time to cook and don't get very crisp on the outside. Maybe we just need more time getting used to it, but we're not thrilled thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Holly W

customer_reviews.title: Oster waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Nice non-stick waffle maker but does not have any indicator that waffles are done and waffles are not as crisp as we like when done. You have to time the waffles and watch for steam to stop coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The brand name let me down.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other 1 & 2 star reviews instead of going with my heart on a quality name brand that I have used in the past. It did not cook the waffles thoroughly or did they ever get crispy no matter how long they were cooked. It is a shame. Oster has always been associated with top quality kitchen products..
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. Keibler

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick, but long cooking time.
customer_reviews.text: Waffles do not stick, which was the prime reason for picking this one. However they do take a LONG time to cook. At least 10 minutes a batch and then soft. If you want crispy, you need to cook longer or perhaps a different sort of recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! I warmed up for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find an old time waffle maker to make regular crispy waffles as opposed to the thick Belgian waffles. Very disappointed! I warmed up for a long time, the first waffle was still dough in the middle, the second waffle never really got crisp on the outside. Not impressed at all! I would highly recommend you keep looking. Do Not Buy This!
customer_reviews.author: Q Keys

customer_reviews.title: Great moneysaver
customer_reviews.text: Makes great waffles. Great size to make ahead and freeze. It makes 4 waffles at a time. I graeat money saver if you've been buying frozen waffles
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Oster DuraCeramic Infusion Series Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: I have used this already about 4 times. It's easy to use and is great for waffles and chaffles.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl In Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Consistently makes great waffles & super easy clean up!! Better than Teflon.
customer_reviews.author: joeln

customer_reviews.title: Great waffle maker - really is non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Great waffle maker - easy to use. You have to play with it a little bit to figure out how to get the waffle exactly how you want it (we like crisp on outside, fluffy inside). Mostly easy to clean, but you have to work a little bit to wipe down the plates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love!! I like to make a lot of waffles at one time and then freeze them for later. With this it takes half the time, plus it’s non-stick which is amazing. It is pretty slim so it doesn’t take up as much room as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I love this waffle iron! It's easy to store standing up. It cleans up easily. And the light indicator is very easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Ventura bhakti devi.

customer_reviews.title: Finally waffles that don’t stick!!
customer_reviews.text: My last waffle maker was on its way out and every waffle i made stuck to the plate. My friend recommended the Oster Duraceramic and I read several reviews and they seemed positive. I have now used it every weekend since i got it and waffles easily come off, and clean up is minimal. I literally just wipe it down with a wet paper towel after it cools off. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Izam

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is great! Nothing sticks to it, even without spray. Nice design, look, and easy to use. Takes 4 minutes to make the perfect waffle. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The waffles made with this waffle iron were floppy and did not rise. It doesn’t get hot enough. I used my old waffle iron to test the same batch of batter and they turned out perfectly. I already recycled the box so can’t even return it. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have all day to heat this thing up...
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to heat up. Takes forever to cook a waffle. I want my old waffle maker back...
customer_reviews.author: JLewis

customer_reviews.title: Great waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wow the waffles are huge :) No sticking once you're able to grab the waffle and pull We love this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make 4 equal waffles.
customer_reviews.text: I love this waffle maker . I now have 2 one for each home.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shea

customer_reviews.title: good old fashioned regular waffles
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves waffles, NOT Belgian waffles. works great, heats really fast. The batter does not stick and I clean it with a three inch paint brush.
customer_reviews.author: mateo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. It simply does not work. It does not get hot enough to cook the batter properly. Tried to use it several times with different batter recipes without success, waffles were limp and rubbery. If we still had the box I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: this new one is wonderful. Nothing sticks to it and the kids love ...
customer_reviews.text: My old waffle iron was about 20 yrs old... this new one is wonderful. Nothing sticks to it and the kids love using it... and I don't have as much to clean up after...
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic waffle irons don’t make crisp waffles
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic waffle irons just aren’t as good as the other kinds. The waffles aren’t crisp. It cleans easily but that’s not relevant if the waffles aren’t great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: ok if you like your waffles flacid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to avoid non stick coating but it does not bake crisp waffles. If you try to leave the batter on for a longer time, the device just turns off. I would not buy this item again. Gave it to goodwill. One star for having a non stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Cie Boy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get hot enough for crispy waffles
customer_reviews.text: The waffle maker doesn’t get hot enough to produce crispy waffles. You have to cook a batch and then toss them in the toaster if you want them crispy. I have tried so many different recipes and techniques to no avail. I was hoping for a thin crispy waffle.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Pale waffles
customer_reviews.text: This never did cook our waffles. It left them a pale yellow/tan. No matter how long we left the batter on. Do not waste your $$$. Hoping to find a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Finch

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t brown the waffles at all! They turn out soggy. Tried several kinds of waffle mix. Finally returned the product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very slow
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t heat nearly enough and therefore takes forever to make a single waffle never mind trying to make multiple. Used it once and gave it away and just sticking with my Bravetti which makes 3-4 waffles in the time this one makes one
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Heating element didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a total loss. This was a gift in June and I only learned that 3 attempts to make waffles failed. The upper heating element was not functional and waffles only cooked on the bottom. I had to purchased a different, less expensive waffle iron as my gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot.
customer_reviews.text: Left this thing plugged in for a half hour, and it never got hot enough to even slightly brown the raw dough.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cooking
customer_reviews.text: The top of mine doesn't get hot enough, so I always have to flip the waffles. Defect or design flaw?
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: fast in supplying and  better than toxic non stick surface.
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaaaaaay better than toxic non stick surface. Came on time and waffles are great!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible product. I would return it if I had ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. I would return it if I had gotten it from a store. t cooks only on one side at a time. Takes 20 minutes to make a waffle. I have never returned anything on Amazon but if I knew how I would return this waffle maker. I will never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Pishanidar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the performance of this product. Cooked evenly and very easy clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: suprmrk

customer_reviews.title: Waffles don't get crispy and take too long to cook
customer_reviews.text: The taste is OK, but the waffles come out floppy. The waffle maker does not heat up fast and the cook time is about 5 minutes. It sounded good when I bought it, but I could not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money !
customer_reviews.text: I love the nonstick ceramic inlay. Makes it easy to clean and you dont have to worry about unhealthy consumption of aluminum intake, or the health hazards of teflon ! That not to mention that you cant get a more simpler device to opporate !
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Non-stick and easy to clean. My waffles come out perfect every time now :)
customer_reviews.author: CodePink

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is a HORRIBLE machine. You are lucky to get a waffle in 15 min and that's only if you like it cooked on one side. This should be removed from the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dan waldie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the thermostat has a bad setting or if the ceramic plates keep the waffles from browning, but the two times I used this waffle iron, the waffles never got even slightly crispy and they didn't brown at all. The recipes I used are ones of used lots of times before on an old iron that finally went out. Don't buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: nashvillemomof4

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean as the plates do not pop off but have to be unscrewed. Also doesn’t seem to get hot enough for crispy waffles. Originally purchased to make keto chaffles but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure it's super hot otherwise it will stick. It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: J Diggs

customer_reviews.title: A great waffle maker from an established manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and it IS easy to clean like the manufacturer states. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kix66

customer_reviews.title: waffles taste metallic
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone else, they said the first batch of waffles they made had a metallic taste. Returning
customer_reviews.author: someguy

customer_reviews.title: Love this waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: Love this waffle iron. The ceramic plates are fantastic and don't stick at all. The waffles seem to come out nice and crisp. I tend to make large batches and freeze them for individual use, and this is the perfect size for that! 4 in one go.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT WOrks but you can not adjust the temperature which I think would produce crisper waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Layafire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to clean and the waffles do not stick
customer_reviews.author: james damron

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. The waffles do not get brown on the top and the bottoms are like cardboard. I followed the directions to the letter. I would not recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my place of work (a breakfast restaurant). However, the waffle maker only last about a 2 months. And there seems to be no option to reach the seller or to be able to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna

customer_reviews.title: Broke just after return window expired
customer_reviews.text: Bought a little over a month ago and now (just outside the return window) it does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything a waffle maker should do, no more, no less.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great basic waffle maker 👌
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean. No stick bit or an oder when very first plugged in. Perfect waffles 😍
customer_reviews.author: Crysten Christie

customer_reviews.title: My best waffle iron.
customer_reviews.text: I have waffle parties regularly and own 7 waffle irons of various types. This one is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Packard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean but slow cooking
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to heat up and then cooking is slow!
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Get creative!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect paleo waffles! Couldn't find what I wanted in the store. Now I am making my own.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Hynes

customer_reviews.title: Not teflon!
customer_reviews.text: I like this waffle maker! I live the ceramic plates & recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bdasef

customer_reviews.title: Top does not cook protein waffles
customer_reviews.text: The top did not cook evenly with the bottom when we made protein waffles. Other waffles it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, trying to get use to it's baking time. great product
customer_reviews.author: lynn bowers

customer_reviews.title: I do not like at all
customer_reviews.text: It takes 10 minutes to cook a waffle. I do not like at all.
customer_reviews.author: Doni

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The waffles tasted a little “processed” at first so maybe a few dry runs or some sort of break in period..
customer_reviews.author: Jason E Creel

customer_reviews.title: I thought I found the perfict waffle make. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It does not crisp up the waffle. My husband say he gets an awful after taste from oil infusion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe we have a defective unit, but this doesn't actually brown the waffles. Sending it back for an exchange based on the other good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: this made the worse waffles. brown on one side raw on the ...
customer_reviews.text: this made the worse waffles.brown on one side raw on the other Don;t buy
customer_reviews.author: Rita Keim

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: The waffle maker is great, I love the white/charcoal, it's cook great
customer_reviews.author: leroy abrams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I've been very happy with this waffle iron
customer_reviews.author: Ural Dude

customer_reviews.title: Awful waffle!
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with an instruction booklet, took more than ten minutes to cook the waffle - and only cooked one side of it, used a ton of batter to make this doughy, inedible waffle! No idea how to clean it as no instructions were included. I would not recommend this product at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Gray

customer_reviews.title: Bought a NEW machine only to receive a USED one...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't know if it works good or not. Received my package a few minutes ago and opened it up only to find I received a USED product when I ordered a NEW one. Parts of the waffle maker are scratched up and the worst part? THERE IS LEFTOVER BATTER SMUDGES. Looks like someone tried cleaning it up, but did a poor job. There is still a sticker on the machine, which gives it the appearance of being new, but it's pretty evident that this was used several times.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse

customer_reviews.title: it's really a great waffle maker and cleans up so easy don't wast ...
customer_reviews.text: it's really a great waffle maker and cleans up so easy don't wast time buy one and get it from amazon they are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personal Preference Rating
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only issue is that it works great at making waffles with the consistency of marshmallows. Too thick for my preference. I gave it two stars since the waffle iron works.
customer_reviews.author: MN Family

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick at all.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I've only used it twice so I may come back in a couple months and add more.
customer_reviews.author: rosanna king

customer_reviews.title: which is great for the two toddlers in the family who are ...
customer_reviews.text: The Oster waffle maker was a gift for my daughter and family. It makes 4 square waffles at one time, which is great for the two toddlers in the family who are hungry and don't understand what daddy means when he says, "wait and be patient.". They love how easily it cleans up and that it's compact enough to store in the cupboard. A great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Yochum

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.text: like that this makes 4 waffles. So easy to clean and needs no oil!
customer_reviews.author: Egret

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time on this - it doesn't get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: We make waffles every morning. Our previous waffle iron coating is wearing off and so I wanted to try this Dura Ceramic coating waffle maker. This waffle iron took >12 minutes to cook one (4 squares) waffle - and it was extremely doughy! I don't have 1 hour, every morning to make waffles for my family. This is being returned the minute our replacement arrives. If however, you like very shallow holes in your waffle, doughy texture, and have plenty of time to hang out in the kitchen, this may be the waffle iron for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: One great waffle iron, one lousy one
customer_reviews.text: My original review: I really was happy to find a waffle iron with the small squares. This thing is fabulous. No oil needed, I've had it for months and it bakes clean each and every time. I liked it so well I gifted one to my daughter, and she can't say enough good things either. Definitely recommend this produce. My update: My waffle iron is super, but the one my daughter received has never worked correctly. The outside gets hard while the inside remains uncooked. Same recipe as mine, so we know it's the iron. so... I guess take your chances, and hope you get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: RIP after only 17 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waffle maker less than a year and a half ago and it is already broken. The bottom no longer heats so the waffles obviously don’t cook. This thing was great at first and I don’t use it often and clean it with a dry cloth wiping it out after every use. It has been taken care of and now it doesn’t work!! 17months exactly and it’s out. Boo. It is a great non stick waffle maker maybe mine was just a lemon. It has been used maybe 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davidson

product_meta.title: Oster DuraCeramic Infusion Series Waffle Maker, White/Charcoal (CKSTWF40WC-IECO)
product_meta.description: Easily make authentic Belgian waffles for the whole family with the Oster DuraCeramic Infusion Series Belgian Waffle Maker. Designed to cook up to four waffles at a time, this waffle iron is molded with a honeycomb pattern that leaves behind deep, crispy pockets that you can fill with fruit, syrups, and other toppings. It features DuraCeramic coating that is infused with olive oil, eliminating the need for cooking spray or oils. The PFOA- and PTFE-free coating also delivers exceptional nonstick performance, helping ensure effortless waffle release and easy cleaning. Compact and easy to use, this Belgian waffle maker takes up minimal space and can be stored vertically. Its convenient ready indicator lights let you know when it is ready to begin cooking.
feature_bullets: Unique, innovative DuraCeramic Infusion Series non-stick ceramic coating, lasts 10 times longer
Exclusive DuraCeramic Infusion Series cooking surface, infused with extra virgin olive oil so there is NO need to add oil when cooking
Natural DuraCeramic Olive Oil Infused coating is PFOA and PTFE free
Cooks up to 29% faster than ordinary non-stick surfaces to save energy and time
Power and Ready indicator lights lets you know when the unit is on and ready to cook
